1550582126_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: Perhaps relevant: [Torrent Freak - When Building a Torrent Site, Streaming Service, or App, Intent is Almost Everything](https://torrentfreak.com/when-building-a-torrent-or-streaming-service-intent-is-almost-everything-190217/). So I suspect if the ***intent*** of a site is violating (or assisting the violation of ) copyright, and the owner makes (or tries to make) money, whether it be through advertising or donations, then prosecutors and courts will be interested.
